object.name: Capabilities.
object.description: This object contains parameters relating to the hardware capabilities of the SGW server.

parameter.name: BearerContextListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: IMSI
parameter.description: IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) is the subscribers permanent identity.

parameter.name: MSISDN
parameter.description: The basic MSISDN of the UE. The presence is dictated by its storage in the HSS.

parameter.name: MmeTeidForS11
parameter.description: MME Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for S11 interface.

parameter.name: MmeIpAddressForS11
parameter.description: MME IP address the S11 interface.

parameter.name: SGwTeidForS11S4
parameter.description: (control plane) S-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S11 Interface and the S4 Interface.

parameter.name: SGwIpAddressForS11S4
parameter.description: (control plane) S-GW IP address for the S11 interface and the S4 Interface.

parameter.name: LastKnownCellId
parameter.description: This is the last location of the UE known by the network

parameter.name: LastKnownCellIdAge
parameter.description: This is the age of the above UE location information

parameter.name: PDNConnectionListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ApnInUse
parameter.description: The APN currently used. APN Network Identifier and the APN Operator Identifier.

parameter.name: PGwAddressInUse
parameter.description: (control plane) The IP address of the P-GW currently used for sending control plane signalling.

parameter.name: SGwIpAddressForS5S8
parameter.description: (control plane) S-GW IP address for the S5/S8 for the control plane signalling.

parameter.name: SGwTeidForS5S8
parameter.description: (control plane) S-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S5/S8 control plane interface.

parameter.name: SGwAddressInUse
parameter.description: (user plane) The IP address of the S-GW currently used for sending user plane traffic.

parameter.name: DefaultBearer
parameter.description: Identifies the default bearer within the PDN connection by its EPS Bearer Id.

parameter.name: EPSBearerListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: EPSBearerList.{i}.
object.description: The following entries defining the EPS Bearer specific parameters are included within the set of parameters defining the PDN Connection.

parameter.name: EPSBearerId
parameter.description: An EPS bearer identity uniquely identifies an EPS bearer for one UE accessing via E-UTRAN

parameter.name: TFT
parameter.description: Traffic Flow Template

parameter.name: PGwAddressInUse
parameter.description: (user plane) The IP address of the P-GW currently used for sending user plane traffic.

parameter.name: PGwTeidForS5S8
parameter.description: (user plane) P-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S5/S8 interface for the user plane.

parameter.name: SGwIpAddressForS5S8
parameter.description: (user plane) S-GW IP address for user plane data received from PDN GW.

parameter.name: SGwTeidForS5S8
parameter.description: (user plane) S-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S5/S8 interface for the user plane.

parameter.name: SGwIpAddressForS1uS12andS4
parameter.description: (user plane) S-GW IP address for the S1-u interface (Used by the eNodeB)

parameter.name: SGwTeidForS1uS12andS4
parameter.description: (user plane) S-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S1-u interface

parameter.name: eNodeBIpAddressForS1u
parameter.description: eNodeB IP address for the S1-u interface (Used by the S-GW).

parameter.name: eNodeBTeidForS1u
parameter.description: eNodeB Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S1-u interface.

parameter.name: EPSBearerQoS
parameter.description: ARP, GBR, MBR, QCI.
